description: Benchmark Report Fixes v5 - Run buttons in empty cells, fair composite scores, dynamic time display, and sorting fixes

userStories.title: Add Run Button to Empty Matrix Cells
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a run button in empty matrix cells so I can trigger a benchmark for that specific matrix.
acceptanceCriteria: Empty matrix cells display a run button (play icon) instead of just '-'
Clicking the button triggers runSolver(lang, matrix, event) for that specific matrix
Button styling matches existing run buttons in populated cells
Run button respects the isLocked flag (don't show for locked languages)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Calculate Composite Score Based on Matching Matrices
userStories.description: As a user, I want composite scores calculated fairly by comparing only the matrices that both the language and C have run.
acceptanceCriteria: For each language, identify which matrices have valid results (status success, not error/timeout)
Calculate C baseline totals using ONLY those same matrices that the language ran
Compute time/mem/cpu/iter ratios using matching matrix subsets
If no matching matrices exist, set normalizedScore to 0 (displays as N/A)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Dynamic Last Run Time Display
userStories.description: As a user, I want the Updated column to show a dynamic time that updates automatically.
acceptanceCriteria: Change static 'Xm ago' text to use a span with class 'relative-time' and data-timestamp attribute
Add JavaScript function updateRelativeTimes() that recalculates all relative times
Call updateRelativeTimes() on page load and every 60 seconds via setInterval
Format: '<1m' for under 1 minute, 'Xm ago', 'Xh ago', 'Xd ago', or date for >30 days
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Verify and Fix Table Sorting Behavior
userStories.description: As a user, I want table sorting to work correctly on first click and toggle on subsequent clicks.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify currentSort starts with empty metric so first click sets natural direction
NAME first click sorts A-Z, TIME/MEMORY/SCORE first click sorts lowest first
Second click on same button reverses direction
N/A scores (value 0) stay at bottom regardless of sort direction
rotate-180 class correctly indicates descending sort
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add Language Diagnostics Data to Report
userStories.description: As a developer, I need diagnostic data embedded in the report HTML for the diagnostics UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate diagnostics object with categories: env_error, timeout, error, missing
Each category lists affected languages with specific matrix failures
Embed diagnostics as JSON in a script tag with id 'diagnosticsData'
Include counts for each category
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add Diagnostics Button and Modal UI
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a diagnostics modal showing which languages have issues.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Diagnostics' button to the toolbar/header area
Create modal that displays diagnostics data grouped by issue type
Show count badges for each category (e.g., 'Env Errors (25)')
List specific languages and their failed matrices under each category
Modal can be closed with X button or clicking outside
Typecheck passes
